author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-592 Declare response as transitional XHTML
- fix style attribute handling (IE is pickier than Firefox)
- Use innerHTML syntax to declare elements with event handlers
because these cannot be declared through DOM in IE (AFAIK)

author: jimk
msg: HBASE-613   Timestamp-anchored scanning fails to find all records
- HRegionServer did not return null if no results were found, it returned empty results
- HTable$ClientScanner.next loop termination condition was incorrect
